entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 12:53 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -22.9°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.0°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
